Commands.Great Haste: Grants Medium Speed Up to all party members for 3 turns.  High Action Delay.
Commands.Regen Waltz: Grants HP Regen to all party members for 3 turns.  High Action Delay.

Passives.Kill BRV Supply: Grants a small amount of BRV after an ally kills an enemy.
Passives.Great Haste BRV Gain: Gains a small amount of BRV after using Great Haste.
Passives.Break Supply: Slightly raises Break Bonus earned after an ally breaks an enemy.
Passives.Regen Waltz Light: Slightly reduces Action Delay after using Regen Waltz.
Passives.Great Haste Charge: Increases the max uses of Great Haste by 1.
Passives.Regen Waltz BRV Gain: Gains a small amount of BRV after using Regen Waltz.
Passives.BRV Speed Up: Slightly raises Speed when BRV is over 50%.
Passives.Regen Waltz Charge: Increases the max uses of Regen Waltz by 1.
Passives.Dance Master: Slightly raises Defense when BRV is over 50%.
Passives.Buff Attack&Boost All: Slightly raises party's Max BRV and Attack while buffed.
Passives.Great Haste Extend: Increases the max uses of Great Haste by 2.Extends buffs granted by Great Haste by 3 turns.Raises party's BRV based on Max BRV.Turns BRV Attack to BRV Attack+ for 7 turns after using Great Haste.BRV Attack+ raises party's BRV based on Max BRV.
Passives.Buff Boost: Moderately raises Max BRV while buffed.
Passives.Regen Waltz Extend: Increases the max uses of Regen Waltz by 2.Extends buffs granted by Regen Waltz by 3 turns.Raises party's BRV based on Max BRV.Turns HP Attack to HP Attack+ for 6 turns after using Regen Waltz.HP Attack+ raises BRV based on Attack before inflicting an HP attack.

Weapons.Platinum Dagger CP: 35: Lowers Regen Waltz's Action Delay and increases the potency of HP Regen.Grants BRV Regen to all party members for 3 turns.
Weapons.Orichalcum Dirk CP: 15: Lowers Great Haste's Action Delay and extends Medium Speed Up's duration.Grants Small Attack Up to all allies for 4 turns.
